name: Samantha Lee
persona: Samantha Lee is a dedicated 21-year-old Biochemistry major who consistently maintains a high CGPA of 3.80. She is highly conscientious and motivated, setting ambitious academic goals and working diligently to achieve them. Samantha manages her time effectively and rarely lets stress interfere with her performance, though she occasionally feels some pressure during exams. Her strong sense of perseverance and self-discipline help her overcome challenges and stay focused on her long-term aspirations, including pursuing graduate studies.
